entry.summary:
Observed at: Esquimalt Harbour 1:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
Temperature: 8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 6.1°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near Haro Strait overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:39 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:39 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait early in the evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:39 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023
